name: C1. Good Subarrays  Easy Version
statement:
An array b of length m is if for all i the i-th element is greater than
or equal to i. In other words, b is if and only if b_i
geq i for all i (1
leq i
leq m).You are given an array a consisting of n positive integers. Find
the number of pairs of indices (l, r), where 1
le l
le r
le n, such that the array [a_l, a_{l+1},
